name: Bowlby One SC
description: Bowlby One SC is designed for use as a utilitarian, All Caps and Small Caps display font. A version with lowercase characters is also available. Its forms are a fusion of a handfull of designs scanned from old, early Twentieth Century type specimens. Bowlby One SC is perfect for big bold headlines and display uses that need a slightly roughened look. Bowlby is a web font, designed to be used freely across the internet by web browsers on desktop computers, laptops, cloud systems and mobile devices.
author: Vernon Adams
